columns.name: environment_name
columns.description: The name of this environment.

columns.name: environment_id
columns.description: The ID of this environment.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The environment's Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

columns.name: description
columns.description: Describes this environment.

columns.name: date_created
columns.description: The creation date for this environment.

columns.name: abortable_operation_in_progress
columns.description: Indicates if there is an in-progress environment configuration update or application version deployment that you can cancel.

columns.name: application_name
columns.description: The name of the application associated with this environment.

columns.name: cname
columns.description: The URL to the CNAME for this environment.

columns.name: date_updated
columns.description: The last modified date for this environment.

columns.name: endpoint_url
columns.description: The URL to the LoadBalancer.

columns.name: health
columns.description: The health status of the environment.

columns.name: health_status
columns.description: Returns the health status of the application running in your environment.

columns.name: operations_role
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the environment's operations role.

columns.name: platform_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the platform version.

columns.name: solution_stack_name
columns.description: The name of the SolutionStack deployed with this environment.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current operational status of the environment.

columns.name: template_name
columns.description: The name of the configuration template used to originally launch this environment.

columns.name: version_label
columns.description: The application version deployed in this environment.

columns.name: configuration_settings
columns.description: Returns a description of the settings for the specified configuration set, that is, either a configuration template or the configuration set associated with a running environment.

columns.name: environment_links
columns.description: A list of links to other environments in the same group.

columns.name: managed_actions
columns.description: A list of upcoming and in-progress managed actions.

columns.name: resources
columns.description: The description of the AWS resources used by this environment.

columns.name: tier
columns.description: Describes the current tier of this environment.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the Repository
